topic.title: Library Overview
topic.shortdesc: Most features (and more) of your every day mail client software are provided by Swift Mailer, using object-oriented PHP code as the interface.

body.p: In this chapter we will take a short tour of the various components, which put together form the Swift Mailer library as a whole. You will learn key terminology used throughout the rest of this book and you will gain a little understanding of the classes you will work with as you integrate Swift Mailer into your application.

This chapter is intended to prepare you for the information contained in the subsequent chapters of this book. You may choose to skip this chapter if you are fairly technically minded, though it is likely to save you some time in the long run if you at least read between the lines here.
